channel.title: Carriers on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Add / Edit
item.description: Shipping-Carriers-add-edit SPECIFICATIONS - SHIPPING > CARRIERS > Add new/Edit What The Add new/Edit Carrier page allows users to create and edit carriers. Specifications As of Sept 9th 2019 Version : 1.7.6.1 Elements in the page Logo Block Logo block: There is a logo block on the left of the page. The title is TITLE. It contains a thumbnail of the image uploaded as logo. Once an image has been uploaded a button with a trashcan icon is available in the block top right corner.
